verses.verse: And it came <WH1961> to pass, when Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Hazor <WH2674> had heard <WH8085> those things, that he sent <WH7971> to Jobab <WH3103> king <WH4428> of Madon, <WH4068> and to the king <WH4428> of Shimron, <WH8110> and to the king <WH4428> of Achshaph, <WH407>

And to the kings <WH4428> that were on the north <WH6828> of the mountains, <WH2022> and of the plains <WH6160> south <WH5045> of Chinneroth, <WH3672> and in the valley, <WH8219> and in the borders <WH5299> of Dor <WH1756> on the west, <WH3220>

And to the Canaanite <WH3669> on the east <WH4217> and on the west, <WH3220> and to the Amorite, <WH567> and the Hittite, <WH2850> and the Perizzite, <WH6522> and the Jebusite <WH2983> in the mountains, <WH2022> and to the Hivite <WH2340> under <WH8478> Hermon <WH2768> in the land <WH776> of Mizpeh. <WH4709>

And they went <WH3318> out, they and all <WH3605> their hosts <WH4264> with them, much <WH7227> people, <WH5971> even as the sand <WH2344> that is on the sea <WH3220> shore <WH8193> in multitude, <WH7230> with horses <WH5483> and chariots <WH7393> very <WH3966> many. <WH7227>

And when all <WH3605> these <WH428> kings <WH4428> were met <WH3259> together, <WH3162> they came <WH935> and pitched <WH2583> together <WH3162> at <WH413> the waters <WH4325> of Merom, <WH4792> to fight <WH3898> against <WH5973> Israel. <WH3478>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> Be not afraid <WH3372> because <WH6440> of them: for to morrow <WH4279> about this <WH2063> time <WH6256> will I deliver <WH5414> them up all <WH3605> slain <WH2491> before <WH6440> Israel: <WH3478> you shall hamstring <WH6131> their horses, <WH5483> and burn <WH8313> their chariots <WH4818> with fire. <WH784>

So Joshua <WH3091> came, <WH935> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of war <WH4421> with him, against <WH5921> them by the waters <WH4325> of Merom <WH4792> suddenly; <WH6597> and they fell <WH5307> on them.

And the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of Israel, <WH3478> who smote <WH5221> them, and chased <WH7291> them to great <WH7227> Zidon, <WH6721> and to Misrephothmaim, <WH4956> and to the valley <WH1237> of Mizpeh <WH4708> eastward; <WH4217> and they smote <WH5221> them, until <WH5704> they left <WH7604> them none <WH1115> remaining. <WH8300>
And Joshua <WH3091> did <WH6213> to them as the LORD <WH3068> bade <WH559> him: he hamstrung <WH6131> their horses, <WH5483> and burnt <WH8313> their chariots <WH4818> with fire. <WH784>

And Joshua <WH3091> at that time <WH6256> turned <WH7725> back, <WH7725> and took <WH3920> Hazor, <WH2674> and smote <WH5221> the king <WH4428> thereof with the sword: <WH2719> for Hazor <WH2674> beforetime <WH6440> was the head <WH7218> of all <WH3605> those <WH428> kingdoms. <WH4467>

And they smote <WH5221> all <WH3605> the souls <WH5315> that were therein with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> utterly destroying <WH2763> them: there was not any <WH3605> left <WH3498> to breathe: <WH5397> and he burnt <WH8313> Hazor <WH2674> with fire. <WH784>

And all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of those <WH428> kings, <WH4428> and all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of them, did Joshua <WH3091> take, <WH3920> and smote <WH5221> them with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and he utterly destroyed <WH2763> them, as Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> commanded. <WH6680>

But as for the cities <WH5892> that stood <WH5975> still in their strength, <WH8510> Israel <WH3478> burned <WH8313> none <WH3808> of them, save <WH2108> Hazor <WH2674> only; <WH905> that did Joshua <WH3091> burn. <WH8313>

And all <WH3605> the spoil <WH7998> of these <WH428> cities, <WH5892> and the cattle, <WH929> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took for a prey <WH962> to themselves; <WH1992> but every <WH3605> man <WH120> they smote <WH5221> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> until <WH5704> they had destroyed <WH8045> them, neither <WH3808> left <WH7604> they any <WH3605> to breathe. <WH5397>

As the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872> his servant, <WH5650> so <WH3651> did Moses <WH4872> command <WH6680> Joshua, <WH3091> and so <WH3651> did <WH6213> Joshua; <WH3091> he left <WH5493> nothing <WH3808> <WH1697> undone <WH5493> of all <WH3605> that the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

So Joshua <WH3091> took <WH3947> all <WH3605> that land, <WH776> the hills, <WH2022> and all <WH3605> the south <WH5045> country, and all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Goshen, <WH1657> and the valley, <WH8219> and the plain, <WH6160> and the mountain <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> and the valley <WH8219> of the same;

Even from the mount <WH2022> Halak, <WH2510> that goes <WH5927> up to Seir, <WH8165> even to Baalgad <WH1171> in the valley <WH1237> of Lebanon <WH3844> under <WH8478> mount <WH2022> Hermon: <WH2768> and all <WH3605> their kings <WH4428> he took, <WH3920> and smote <WH5221> them, and slew <WH4191> them.
Joshua <WH3091> made <WH6213> war <WH4421> a long <WH7227> time <WH3117> with all <WH3605> those <WH428> kings. <WH4428>

There was not a city <WH5892> that made peace <WH7999> with the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> save <WH1115> the Hivites <WH2340> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gibeon: <WH1391> all <WH3605> other they took <WH3947> in battle. <WH4421>

For it was of the LORD <WH3068> to harden <WH2388> their hearts, <WH3820> that they should come <WH7122> against <WH7125> Israel <WH3478> in battle, <WH4421> that he might destroy <WH2763> them utterly, and that they might have <WH1961> no <WH1115> favor, <WH8467> but that he might destroy <WH8045> them, as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

And at that time <WH6256> came <WH935> Joshua, <WH3091> and cut <WH3772> off the Anakims <WH6062> from the mountains, <WH2022> from Hebron, <WH2275> from Debir, <WH1688> from Anab, <WH6024> and from all <WH3605> the mountains <WH2022> of Judah, <WH3063> and from all <WH3605> the mountains <WH2022> of Israel: <WH3478> Joshua <WH3091> destroyed <WH2763> them utterly with their cities. <WH5892>

There was none <WH3808> of the Anakims <WH6062> left <WH3498> in the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> only <WH7535> in Gaza, <WH5804> in Gath, <WH1661> and in Ashdod, <WH795> there remained. <WH7604>

So Joshua <WH3091> took <WH3947> the whole <WH854> <WH3605> land, <WH776> according to all <WH3605> that the LORD <WH3068> said <WH1696> to Moses; <WH4872> and Joshua <WH3091> gave <WH5414> it for an inheritance <WH5159> to Israel <WH3478> according to their divisions <WH4256> by their tribes. <WH7626> And the land <WH776> rested <WH8252> from war. <WH4421>
